Constructor Detail

Main

public Main(java.io.File networkFile,
            java.io.File inputFile)
     throws javolution.xml.stream.XMLStreamException,
            java.io.IOException
Creates a new Main simulation object and starts the simulation. A gui is generated. The network and inputs used in the simulation are specified by the given networkFile and inputFile.

Parameters:
networkFile - xml file specifying the network this simulation will use.
inputFile - xml file specifying the input this simulation will use.
Throws:
javolution.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
java.io.IOException

Main

public Main()
Creates a new Main simulation object in test mode and starts the simulation. No gui is used; this simulation runs in console mode and for 10 time steps. It uses a hard coded 2-node network with no inputs, and traces the network, ensuring that various node/link fields contain expected values.
